system.description: At 14th level you gain the ability to ritually cast the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.h5ssew7apf5ofbhc]{Commune} spell, contacting an entity of the deeps, once per long rest. In addition you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.pdwrag8eq7r0ldcp]{Commune with Nature} as a ritual at will, but only in areas with a significant natural body of water (a large river, a swamp, many small rivers, a lake, the coast, at sea, etc.)
